title: Phishing email delivered
description: A targeted phishing email with a credential-harvesting link was delivered to multiple recipients.

title: User clicked malicious link
description: An employee clicked the credential-harvesting link and submitted credentials to a fake portal.

title: First-stage loader downloaded
description: A small downloader (first-stage) was retrieved from a remote URL by the compromised browser.

title: Loader executed (first-stage)
description: The downloaded loader was executed and attempted to persist and fetch secondary payloads.

title: Second-stage payload downloaded
description: The loader fetched a larger second-stage payload (obfuscated binary) from a remote server.

title: Payload executed and persistence achieved
description: The secondary payload executed, created persistence, and began reconnaissance on the local subnet.

title: C2 communication established
description: The compromised host established encrypted command-and-control (C2) sessions to an external IP.

title: Lateral movement and data collection
description: Attacker moved laterally to a file server and started aggregating sensitive business documents.

title: Files compressed for exfil
description: Collected documents were compressed and packaged in preparation for exfiltration.

title: Data exfiltration to external host
description: Compressed archive transferred to an external cloud storage endpoint over HTTPS.
